title: Boy with Luv
brief_description: South Korean boy band BTS enlist American singer Halsey for one of their biggest music video hits, which gained over 74.6 million views in its first day of release. The music video is inspired by Singin’ in the Rain.

constellations_other.name: Sound and Hollywood
constellations_other.description: The impact of sound on Tinsel Town stretches from the beginning of cinema to recent award-winners, as well as the biggest band in K-Pop.

description:
“Boy with Luv” (Korean: 작은 것들을 위한 시) is a song recorded by South Korean boy band BTS, featuring American singer Halsey, as the lead single for their sixth EP Map of the Soul: Persona.

It was released on April 12, 2019 by Big Hit Entertainment. The song’s MV is the most viewed online music video in 24 hours, garnering over 74.6 million views within its first day of release. On June 24, 2019, Billboard announced that the song had been certified Platinum by the RIAA.
